game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the depths of the temple
game.description: Rumors speak of a long-lost temple hidden deep within the mystical forest, where an ancient scroll holds the secrets of the ancient civilization. Brave adventurers are needed to retrieve this treasure and uncover its mysteries.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet, and the blessing of the village elder
game.quest-giver: Elder Thorne, Village Elder of Oakwood

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location from local villagers
task.description: Speak with the villagers and gather any information you can find about the lost temple. They may be hesitant to share their knowledge, but a bit of gold or a well-timed jest might loosen their tongues.

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous paths and find the temple entrance
task.description: The journey to the temple is fraught with danger. Keep your wits about you as you navigate through the dark forest, avoiding deadly traps and terrifying creatures.

task.objective: Solve the ancient puzzles to unlock the inner sanctum
task.description: The temple is filled with mysterious contraptions and enigmatic symbols. Use your knowledge and skills to solve the puzzles, unlocking doors and revealing hidden secrets.

task.objective: Rtrieve the ancient scroll from the heart of the temple
task.description: Finally, reach the inner sanctum and retrieve the coveted scroll. But beware: powerful guardians may be waiting to protect their treasure.
